column1: #SHEETINFO | name=Text-to-Speech Examples

column2: Overview of Text-to-Speech Markers
Marker
Cell markers
~#tts<column(s)>:<language>#~
column3:
Marker for the whole cell, when added to column G (Notes).

● <column(s)> - allowed values: Q, A, I, representing the Question, Answer, and Additional Info columns. They can be combined, for example: QA, AI, QI, QAI. The order does not matter.

● <language> - the language that will be read aloud, in the format en-US, fr-FR, pl-PL, etc., according to RFC4646.

column2: ~#tts:<language>#~
column3:
Marker for an entire cell, when placed anywhere within the text of the Question (B), Answer (C), or Additional Info (D) columns.

● <language> - the language that will be read aloud, in the format en-US, fr-FR, pl-PL, etc., according to RFC4646.

column2: Inline markers
~#tts:<language>{<text>}#~
column3:
Inline marker that adds a speaker icon directly within the displayed content. The icon can be clicked to play only this specific part.

● <text> - the text that will be read aloud, after which the speaker icon will appear.

● <language> - the language that will be read aloud, in the format en-US, fr-FR, pl-PL, etc., according to RFC4646.
column4: ~#tts:en-US{This part will be read in English, and an additional speaker icon will be added that allows the user to play only this part}#~

column2: ~#tts:nap:<language>{<text>}#~
column3:
Inline marker that adds a speaker icon for a specific part of the text, but prevents that part from being played automatically. The user can still play it by clicking the icon.

● <text> - the text that will be read aloud when the icon is clicked.

● <language> - the language that will be read aloud, in the format en-US, fr-FR, pl-PL, etc., according to RFC4646.
column4: ~#tts:nap:en-US{This part will be omitted when autoplay is enabled. You can still listen to it by clicking the speaker icon on the right.}#~

column2: ~#tts:exclude{<text>}#~
column3:
Inline marker that prevents the enclosed text from being read aloud. The text remains visible but is ignored by the Text-to-Speech engine. This is useful for excluding parts of a cell that would otherwise be read entirely due to a cell-wide marker.

● <text> - the text that will be displayed but not read aloud.
column4: ~#tts:exclude{This part will be excluded from reading aloud.}#~

column1: Cell Text-to-Speech Markers
1. This question will not be read aloud.
column2: This answer will not be read aloud.
column3: This content will not be read aloud.

column1: 2. The question should be read in English and a speaker icon should appear, because a TTS cell marker was provided in column G.
column2: This answer will not be read aloud.
column3: This content will not be read aloud.

column1: 3. This question should not be read aloud.
column2: Odpowiedź powinna być czytana po polsku i powinien pojawić się głośnik, ponieważ w kolumnie G został podany marker TTS.
column3: This content will not be read aloud.

column1: 4. This question should not be read aloud.
column2: 回答应以中文朗读，并显示扬声器图标。

column1:
5. La pregunta debe leerse en español y debe aparecer un icono de altavoz.
~#no-swap#~
column2: The answer should be read in English and a speaker icon should appear, because a TTS cell marker was provided in column G.
column3: This content should not be read aloud. The no-swap marker will also work as expected.

column1: 6. प्रश्न हिंदी भाषा में पढ़ा जाना चाहिए और एक स्पीकर दिखाई देना चाहिए।
column2: This sentence will not be read aloud.
column3: Les informations supplémentaires seront lues en français.
column6:
Of course, you can also add Notes to this field, and it should not affect the recognition of markers.
~#ttsQ:hi-IN#~
~#ttsI:fr-FR#~
Marker detection is performed throughout the entire text - not just at the beginning or the end.

column1: 7. A pergunta deve ser lida em português e um ícone de alto-falante deve aparecer.
column2: The answer should be read in English and a speaker icon should appear.
column3: سيتم قراءة المعلومات الإضافية باللغة العربية.

column1: 8. All of these sentences
column2: should be read aloud
column6:
~#ttsQAI:en-US#~

TTS markers can be combined with the ~#no-swap#~ marker.

column1: 9. Alle diese Sätze
column2: sollten auf Deutsch
column6:
~#ttsIQA:de-DE#~

The order of the columns specified in the marker does not matter - QAI will have exactly the same effect as AIQ or IAQ.

column1: 10. The question should be read aloud in English, and a speaker icon should appear.
column2: Ответ должен быть прочитан на русском языке, и должен отображаться значок динамика.
column3: Также содержимое этого поля будет прочитано на русском языке.

column1: 11. TTS markers do not have to be in column G. They can be placed anywhere in the cell text. For example, at the end of this sentence.~#tts:en-US#~
column2: ~#tts:en-US#~Or at the beginning, whichever is more convenient.
column3: They can also be added in the middle of the text.~#tts:en-US#~ The system will detect the marker, enable Text-to-Speech, and remove the marker from the displayed content.

column1: Inline Text-to-Speech Markers

12. Example question with inline content, meaning only the part marked with the marker should be read.

~#tts:en-US{Additionally, the text can be read by pressing the speaker icon located directly next to the content.}#~
column2:
Some sample answer, that you can also decorate with text-to-speech ability.

~#tts:en-GB{This part will be read aloud.}#~

This part won't be read aloud.
column3:
This sentence won't be read aloud.
~#tts:pl-PL{Ta część zostanie przeczytana na głos po polsku.}#~

Feel free to experiment with the markers and languages.
~#tts:en-US{This part will be read aloud in English.}#~
This part won't be read aloud.

column1:
13. You can use both full-cell markers (in this case the cell marker was provided in column G) and inline markers.

For example:
This is a question with inline content that should be read in a different language.
~#tts:pl-PL{Ten fragment zostanie przeczytany po polsku, a dodatkowa ikona głośnika pozwoli użytkownikowi odtworzyć tylko tę treść.}#~
And then the rest of the text will be read in English.
column2:
~#tts:en-US#~The content of this cell will be read in English, since a cell marker was added here.
~#tts:de-DE{Man kann jedoch festlegen, dass dieser Abschnitt auf Deutsch vorgelesen wird, und ein zusätzliches Lautsprechersymbol ermöglicht es, ihn unabhängig vom restlichen Inhalt abzuspielen.}#~
Then it will automatically switch back to English.
column3: You can freely combine cell-wide TTS markers with inline markers.

column1: Advanced Markers

14. No-Autoplay Marker.

This part of the question will be read in English, and a speaker icon will appear (as the TTS cell marker was added to column G).
~#tts:nap:en-US{However, this part will be omitted when autoplay is enabled. You can still listen to it by clicking the speaker icon on the right.}#~
Then, this part will be read aloud.
~#tts:nap:pl-PL{To także nie będzie przeczytane automatycznie. Aby wyzwolić czytanie, należy manualnie kliknąć w ikonę głośnika po prawej stronie.}#~
column2:
~#tts:en-US#~The content of this cell will be read in English (since the TTS cell marker was added at the beginning). 
~#tts:nap:bg-BG{Въпреки това, тази част ще бъде пропусната, когато е включено автоматичното възпроизвеждане. Все пак можете да я чуете, като кликнете върху иконата на високоговорителя вдясно.}#~
Then, this part will be read aloud.

column1:
15. Exclude Marker.

This part of the question will be read in English, and a speaker icon will appear (as the TTS cell marker was added to column G).
~#tts:exclude{This part will be excluded from reading aloud.}#~
Then, this part will be read aloud.
~#tts:exclude{This will also be excluded from reading aloud: (2<sup>2</sup> + 6) ⋅ \( \frac{1}{2} \)}#~
column2:
The content of this cell will be read in English (as the TTS cell marker was added at the end). 
~#tts:nap:en-US{However, this part will be omitted when autoplay is enabled. You can still listen to it by clicking the speaker icon on the right.}#~
Then, this part will be read aloud.
~#tts:exclude{And this part will be excluded.}#~
~#tts:en-US#~
column3:
~#tts:en-US#~The content of this cell will be read in English (since the TTS cell marker was added at the beginning). 
~#tts:nap:en-US{This part will be omitted when autoplay is enabled. You can still listen to it by clicking the speaker icon on the right.}#~
This part will be read aloud.
~#tts:exclude{And this part will be excluded.}#~
~#tts:en-US{This part will be read in English, and an additional speaker icon will be added that allows the user to play only this part.}#~
~#tts:exclude{This will also be excluded from reading aloud: \( \displaystyle\sum_{k=1}^n k^2 = \frac{1}{2} n (n+1) \)}#~
